name: Prompt Architect
author: CharaForge
description: An advanced DataPack for precise control over scene composition, using a highly granular, Danbooru-style prompt structure. Ideal for power users who want to define every aspect of the generated image.

promptTemplates.name: character_focus
promptTemplates.template: A masterpiece portrait of a {race}, {facial_features}, with {hair} and {eyes}, wearing {head_clothing}, {torso_clothing}, and {neck_accessory}. {lighting} with a {mood} atmosphere, {art_style}.

promptTemplates.name: scene_focus
promptTemplates.template: A breathtaking {art_style} scene of a {location}, {scene_detail}. The {weather} creates a {mood} mood under {lighting}.

promptTemplates.name: action_focus
promptTemplates.template: Dynamic action shot of a {race} {action}, wielding a {hands_weapon}, wearing {torso_armor}, {legs_armor}, and {feet_armor}. {effects} fill the scene, {camera} captures the intensity. {art_style}.

promptTemplates.name: integrated
promptTemplates.template: In a {location} under {lighting}, a {race} with {hair} is {action}. They are wearing {torso_armor} and {legs_clothing}, creating a {mood} scene. {art_style}, {masterpiece_quality}.

race.label: Naga Warrior
race.value: Naga Warrior, serpentine lower body, long muscular snake tail, tall and sinuous frame, bronze skin

race.label: Cyborg Ninja
race.value: Cyborg Ninja, glowing cybernetic lines, muscular build

race.label: Gothic Vampire
race.value: Gothic Vampire, pale skin, sharp features

eyes.label: Glowing Golden Eyes
eyes.value: glowing golden eyes with slit pupils

clothing.label: Black Velvet Coat
clothing.value: black velvet coat, hip vent, high collar

pose.label: Powerful Stance
pose.value: standing in a powerful and enigmatic pose, arms at sides, head tilted

art_style.label: 2D-HD Style
art_style.value: 2D-HD style, 32-bit color palette, crisp edges, no anti-aliasing

art_style.label: Anime CG
art_style.value: anime CG, official art, game CG

masterpiece_quality.label: Masterpiece
masterpiece_quality.value: masterpiece, best quality, amazing quality, very detailed
